distri: Looking at the number of songs, we can state that the analysis of Metal songs properties can be done since the middle of the 80s. It is very interesting to observe that the Metal music of the 90s is still almost as much listened to (hottness) as the newer songs.
Hottness: The acoustiness of metal songs has always been lower than the average songs. Indeed metal music is famous for its amazing electric guitar rifts. Instrumentalness seems to have slowly changed over the years to finally reach the same amount has the average music.
